Trial_Design.evidence: Forty men were randomized into a SAP group or a SAP+PERT group

Objective.evidence: we sought to compare strength, agility, and secondary prevention (SAP) treatment with SAP plus perturbation training (SAP+PERT)

Method_Outcome.evidence: Participants underwent motion analysis during overground walking at 1 and 2 years postoperatively

Randomisation_Allocation.evidence: Forty men were randomized into a SAP group or a SAP+PERT group

Number_Analysed.evidence: At 1 year, 11 of 18 SAP and 11 of 20 SAP+PERT athletes

Result_Outcome.evidence: mean difference: −1°; 95% confidence interval [CI], −5° to 2°; p = 0.49
